text:
After this visit, Dr. Tay has become my preferred doctor. He is incredibly patient, attentive, and takes the time to thoroughly understand my condition. His approach to medical care is not only professional but also reassuring, as he carefully listens to my concerns and provides clear explanations. I truly appreciate his dedication to helping patients and ensuring the best possible treatment.

Additionally, the front desk staff deserves special recognition. They are exceptionally polite, patient, and welcoming, creating a comfortable and pleasant experience from the moment I walk in. Their professionalism and friendliness make a significant difference in the overall quality of care at the clinic.

I am grateful to have found such a reliable and compassionate doctor, along with a supportive clinic team. I highly recommend Dr. Tay and this clinic to anyone seeking quality medical care.

This clinic was actually referred to me by my friend as we have same concerns with acne breakouts, and I still remember my very first visit at 360.ðŸ¤—
Staffs at the front desk greeted me with a smile and were actually very accommodating and nice.They were soft spoken and made sure that I feel at ease and that  I understood the instructions of taking the medications prescribed.
The Doctors are highly commendable as they display professionalism with empathy and kindness, giving reassurance that they will help me in my acne journey.
Over all 360 clinic is 10/10, the clinic was a bit too far from where I stay but I never mind going back at the clinic every month as they offer quality service

The doctor was very approachable and the receptionist was very polite and helpful, which made my treatment very pleasant.I heard from my friends that this clinic has a good reputation. I recommend you to come here.

Been visiting this clinic many times.
Dr Tay is professional, patient and a knowledgeable person taking time to explain your issues and make sure you understand. The clinic nurses are warm, polite and helpful. Make my sick day pleasant.ðŸ˜Š

The clinic is well maintained and ventilated.

Thank you for the kind and immediate assistance of Ms Vivien, Ms Penny and Dr Tay.
